name: Telerep
tagline: You envision it, we make it happen!
description:
TeleRep, Inc. is a direct provider of 24/7 Customized Call Center Solutions--serving the diversified needs of many Maryland businesses, such as Johns Hopkins Medical System, Constellation Energy, and Valassis, since 1976.Â 
TeleRep is a local company owned and operated by a family that has more than 30 years in the call center and answering service business.
